short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search web with our world class search engine powered by bing & take full webpage screenshot if you find info useful

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We live in the age of information. Internet has made information available at the click of a button. But getting to right information and then capturing it simultaneously is a serious task not everyone is adept at!
Whether you are a student, a working professional or a research scholar we need to access internet for our reports and daily work. We need a good search engine for quickly getting to right information source. That's where our world class search engine powered by Bing comes to your rescue. 
Once we get to right information how to capture is quite a task! You can take multiple screenshot of a lengthy webpage with print screen. But it would be messy to arrange so much of screenshots for your project. Our screenshot tool helps you take full webpage screenshots in on e go. Without any hiccups. Try it once. We are sure you would love it!
